originalText.text: preston was the salesperson for this job - he was comprehensive and professional. Quick was his communication with me. Dean was the supervisor for this project and was as professional and responsive as preston. Any inquiries that I had about the ongoing task - dean made sure that I comprehended and kept me updated about any stage of the work. The team that did the roof replacement for New York Contemporary Roofing LLC demonstrated an excellent work ethic and did commendable work. Any concerns I had about the ongoing roofer task in New York, were promptly addressed by Greyson and I was kept informed about every phase of the work. They did a great job with the roof replacement.

originalText.text: I had a leak around my chimney and contacted several contractors. Many never returned my call. Once I talked to All About Roofing, Seth gave me an estimate the next day. The task was completed and professionally, and our roof has not leaked since the repair. recommended!

text.text: I had a leak around my chimney and contacted several contractors. Many never returned my call. Once I talked to All About Roofing, Seth gave me an estimate the next day. The task was completed and professionally, and our roof has not leaked since the repair. recommended!

originalText.text: Seth has been a pleasure to job with. He is client and work focused, accessible, reliable and works to ensure complete satisfaction. He actively listens to my needs, sets clear expectations and communicates effectively. He is also an all-around nice person. I consider him a trusted advisor.

originalText.text: Rodney was Awesome! knowledgeable and Professional with an Absolute caring Personality! Quality Customer work and Exceeded my Expectations. superb Experience and Price was reasonable considering my unit was never serviced for Almost 7 years! Will use company again. Thank You Rodney!
